ComicInfo.Title: Stumbling Distance Conclusion
ComicInfo.Summary:
The wrenching conclusion of “Stumbling Distance.” On a trip to his past, alcoholic writer William Gaunt must decide if he’ll intervene in his childhood self’s imminent suicide attempt and if he’ll confront his monstrous mother. And if he does, what havoc will it wreak on the future?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A/Reg | Regular Cover | Guiu Vilanova (a) & Vinicius Andrade (c) | 1 | B/Var | Variant Cover | Francesco Francavilla | 2 | C/Sub | Subscription Cover | Jonathan Lau (a) & Ivan Nunes (c) | 3 | D/RI | 1:15 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Guiu Vilanova | 4 | E/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Cover | Jonathan Lau | 5 | F/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Cover | Francesco Francavilla | 6 |
